channel.title: Hai all, whats new in the rsc-scene?
channel.description: meh, kinda stupid post i guess. But can anyone catch me up to date with whats new? and, is there a rsc-player base still out there?

item.title: Hai all, whats new in the rsc-scene?
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

[quote=“mapu, post:69, topic:351251”][quote author=The_AFKer link=topic=447610.msg3297053#msg3297053 date=1281022456]

What makes me wonder is why Kryptix and Lukesq are in constant contact. Luke SQL injects Kryptix’s server, and the servers of his friends (KO9), and yet Kryptix and Luke remain friends. Pretty suspicious don’t you think? If someone were to inject my popular server I’d be looking for revenge, not looking to be best friends with the guy.
On the other hand, with Lukesq on his side… All Krytpix would have to do is send Lukesq a PM asking for a tiny favor.

WHO KNOWS? Just something to think about.

It’s pretty much the same thing with Tew/L or Hixk. It’s just one of those things. You talk and shit but they might just fuck your shit up for lols. If you’re like me or kryptix you won’t take it to heart.

No…not really. They’re actually pretty cool if you talk to them like normal people and not wanna-be “4chaners”.
[/quote]

I don’t talk to them like 4channers. It’s not really tew/L but hixk would always do it. I find I don’t get any problems anymore now I don’t play RSC so i’m a happy camper anyway. Also long time no see, how you been?[/quote]

Decent I guess, you?

Read full topic
item.source: Hai all, whats new in the rsc-scene?

item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“The_AFKer, post:68, topic:351251”][quote author=mapu link=topic=447610.msg3296477#msg3296477 date=1280976637]

What makes me wonder is why Kryptix and Lukesq are in constant contact. Luke SQL injects Kryptix’s server, and the servers of his friends (KO9), and yet Kryptix and Luke remain friends. Pretty suspicious don’t you think? If someone were to inject my popular server I’d be looking for revenge, not looking to be best friends with the guy.
On the other hand, with Lukesq on his side… All Krytpix would have to do is send Lukesq a PM asking for a tiny favor.

WHO KNOWS? Just something to think about.

It’s pretty much the same thing with Tew/L or Hixk. It’s just one of those things. You talk and shit but they might just fuck your shit up for lols. If you’re like me or kryptix you won’t take it to heart.
[/quote]

No…not really. They’re actually pretty cool if you talk to them like normal people and not wanna-be “4chaners”.[/quote]

I don’t talk to them like 4channers. It’s not really tew/L but hixk would always do it. I find I don’t get any problems anymore now I don’t play RSC so i’m a happy camper anyway. Also long time no see, how you been?

[quote=“Newty, post:56, topic:351251”][quote author=Lukeidiot link=topic=447610.msg3290419#msg3290419 date=1280519513]

Lukeidiot’s IP(s):

Most recent IP address:
76.106..14
IPs used in messages:
76.106..10
76.106.*.14[/quote]

Not going to post Kryptix’s but I assure you all that they don’t match and that Kryptix’s account has only ever been logged in from 1 IP.

The tribe has spoken.

If you could edit out some numbers that would be nice.

Done.[/quote]

Thanks

item.title: Hai all, whats new in the rsc-scene?
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:10, topic:351502”][quote author=Ecko link=topic=447610.msg3288610#msg3288610 date=1280378009]86.7.138.3

This is not current. From around January 2010.[/quote]
That’s clearly my IP which I’m posting from right now, it’s nothing to do with anyone else except me.

Oh and by if I am Lukesq then I must have made these sites too to try and convince people…

http://www.lukeidiot.com
http://www.emailspoof.net

Oh and I’ve used the e-mail lukeidiot@gmail.com quite a bit, I really want this to be convincing right…

http://www.google.co.uk/search?q=lukeidiot@gmail.com

Shit, I even registered here over a year before RSCEmulation was even released, I’ve been planning this massive cover up for quite some time…

Sell & Trade Game Items | OSRS Gold | ELO

NEW RuneScape HD - Phisher

I am selling the first RuneScape HD Phisher out. There is probably none other rs phisher out there, that comes close to this phisher. It looks real....

You’re a moron, seriously.

[quote author=OldSkoolRSC link=topic=447610.msg3287550#msg3287550 date=1280299805]This is what u wrote in ur own words…so tell me…u got 600 subscribers the last month u wrote in forums…how much per sub would that work out to be if u kept to the plan?

GREEDY GREEDY GREEDY[/quote]
Things change. Back then we had a single, non-DDoS protected server and a Ventrilo as our monthly out goings, we now have far more than that including two completely separate servers with Staminus, various advertisement schemes (topped up Bing with 400$ this morning funnily enough) as well as paying developers such as xEnt. The plan to reduce the subscription prices monthly went out of the window when we introduced the ability to use them for other reasons such as stat resets, character renames and character transfers. If you went that far through the posts you will also have read that I was quite prepared to limit the amount of subscriptions sold monthly but the idea got shot down by the community. The amount of subscriptions sold monthly fluctuates drastically so there’s no way to tell how many are going to sell even to the nearest 200 so limiting them was never going to work.

Plus, quite frankly, if developers such as xEnt will be getting paid for work they do why shouldn’t I? Zilent and I have put far more into this project than any future developer is ever likely to so I guess that makes xEnt and anyone else who expects a bit of payment for their time too.[/quote]
lol iam not saying anything but if you go to read this tread http://sythe.org/showthread.php?p=3265699 kinda sounds like you uses same words in the same way but yea i said it

Read full topic
item.source: Hai all, whats new in the rsc-scene?
